Html:
Hi Radioman,

Thanks for sharing such a useful component. I am facing an issue with 1.6 version as SetCurrentPositionByKeywords("haryana, India") is resulting into an error "Exception in code".

I tried the 1.7 version also and that is working, however the method is different there SetPositionByKeywords

I am using VS 2008(.Net 3.5) and the project in which I am planning to integrate Gmaps.net is on .Net 3.5, so I have to use 1.6 stable version. Can you please just give some pointer about the exception reported. I saw other users also have reported this issue but solution wise I cannot find any 1.7 version for .Net 3.5.

Thanks,
Amit
just use latest version, 1.6 is quite old...

Thanks Radioman. I will use the 1.7 version. Problem is 1.7 version library are not getting linked with existing 3.5 .Net version project which I am planning to integrate with GMaps.net

Thanks,
Amit
you can rebuild using whatever version you want
